name: Watermelon Park & RV Campground
note: $65/night for a non-waterfront electric spot, 2 adults.  Additional adult +$10.

name: Sweetwater Vacation Properties
note: $75/night (incl. tax/fees) for a riverfront spot w/full hookups

name: Low Water Bridge Campground
note: $50/night (incl. tax/fees) for a primitive riverfront spot, 2 adults.  Additional adult +$12.  Electric site +$10.

name: River's Edge Campground
note: $62/night (incl. tax/fees) for a riverfront spot w/full hookups

name: Larry and Penny Thompson Memorial Park and Campground
note: Recommended by Grok as a good stopping point on the way to Key West that avoids downtown Miami

name: Lily Bay State Park
note: Recommended by Grok as one of the best campgrounds in Maine
